Posts.EditableText: I just started with Quest and would like to know how to add background images (or even colors, really) to my gamebook. How would I do that?
Posts.HTML: I just started with Quest and would like to know how to add background images (or even colors, really) to my gamebook. How would I do that?

Posts.EditableText: Check the Display tab in the game section
Posts.HTML: Check the Display tab in the game section
